title: Which IPL team is stronger in 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, this is Raghuram I'm a huge CSK Fan but the majority of players in CSK are above 32 age now at that time they'll reach 34,35. May be DHONI will not fit at that time which is minus for CSK. At that time DELHI CAPITALS will have the stronger players, As we see the players in Delhi capitals are young and they are physically fit to play the match so that will help for the team. Thank you .
